steps.name: Click on a random women category item
Close the popup if it appears
Close the popup if it appears
Click on a random item and add it to the cart
Close the popup if it appears
Close the popup if it appears
Close the popup if it appears
Get the first available size of the item
Close the popup if it appears
Click on the Add to bag button
Close the popup if it appears
Click on the View Bag button
